title: Genkaku Picasso, Vol. 3
description: Having cheated death, Hikaru Hamura must save himself by using his artistic abilities to help others.Once a loner, Hikari "Picasso" Hamura has helped so many people that he finds himself surrounded by friends! Picasso's going to need them as he faces his most difficult "portrait" yet. It's easy to deal with other people's problems. But when you have to face your own...
author: Usamaru Furuya
